articles.description: Life on the ocean floor 80 million years ago was tough. Sea levels were shallow, predators were ever on the prowl, and there was always some other slimy, spiky, hard-shelled critter willing to steal your spot.
articles.content:
Life on the ocean floor 80 million years ago was tough. Sea levels were shallow, predators were ever on the prowl, and there was always some other slimy, spiky, hard-shelled critter willing to steal your spot.
To survive, ancient relatives of the sea urchin … [+4866 chars]

articles.author: Nina Pullano
articles.title: For the surprisingly slow T. rex "life was a marathon, not a sprint" — study - Inverse
articles.description: Researchers collected data on 70 species of theropod dinosaurs, including T. Rex, looking at their relative limb lengths, body sizes, and gaits.
articles.content:
The Tyrannosaurus rex was scary, sure, but getting away from its powerful bite and five-foot-long skull might have been easier than you would think. 
In an iconic Jurassic Park scene, as the ragtag team speeds away from a charging T. rex in an open-top jeep,… [+5072 chars]

articles.author: Space.com Staff
articles.title: Watch Live Sunday! Space Force to launch X-37B space plane on secret mission - Space.com
articles.description: Liftoff is set for 9:14 a.m. EDT (1314 GMT).
articles.content: An Atlas V rocket will launch an X-37B space plane on a secret mission for the U.S. Space Force and Air Force on Sunday, May 17, and you can watch it live here courtesy of the United Launch Alliance (ULA). A Saturday launch attempt was thwarted by bad weather… [+3983 chars]
